text: Ara khusakhabara da'o tadera yara imana eneche ara satkarma kare, tadera jan'ya ache jannata, yadera nica diye baye caleche jharanaraji! Yatabara e theke phalaphasala tadera khete deya haya tara bale -- â€œe se'i ya era age amadera kha'oyano hayechilaâ€, karana tadera e deya haya anukarane. Ara tadera jan'ya era madhye ache pabitra sangisathi ara ete tara thakabe cirakala.
